mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO advertise_tb ( name, type, subtype, img, link, unit_price, unit_delivery_number, now_unit_delivery_number, unit_money, now_unit_money, status, start_delivery_date, end_delivery_date, update_date, admin_id) VALUES ( #{name}, #{type}, #{subtype}, #{img}, #{link}, #{unitPrice}, #{unitDeliveryNumber}, #{nowUnitDeliveryNumber}, #{unitMoney}, #{nowUnitMoney}, #{status}, #{startDeliveryDate}, #{endDeliveryDate}, #{updateDate}, #{adminId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE advertise_tb SET name=#{name}, type=#{type}, subtype=#{subtype}, img=#{img}, link=#{link}, unit_price=#{unitPrice}, unit_delivery_number=#{unitDeliveryNumber}, now_unit_delivery_number=#{nowUnitDeliveryNumber}, unit_money=#{unitMoney}, now_unit_money=#{nowUnitMoney}, status=#{status}, start_delivery_date=#{startDeliveryDate}, end_delivery_date=#{endDeliveryDate}, update_date=#{updateDate}, admin_id=#{adminId} WHERE advertise_id=#{advertiseId}
mapper.select: SELECT advertise_id, name, type, subtype, img, link, unit_price, unit_delivery_number, now_unit_delivery_number, unit_money, now_unit_money, status, start_delivery_date, end_delivery_date, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_tb WHERE advertise_id=#{advertiseId}

SELECT advertise_id, name, type, subtype, img, link, unit_price, unit_delivery_number, now_unit_delivery_number, unit_money, now_unit_money, status, start_delivery_date, end_delivery_date, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_tb as a1 JOIN (SELECT ROUND(RAND() * ((SELECT MAX(advertise_id) FROM advertise_tb)-(SELECT MIN(advertise_id) FROM advertise_tb))+(SELECT MIN(advertise_id) FROM advertise_tb)) AS aid) AS a2 WHERE unit_price>=#{unitPrice} AND status=#{status} AND a1.advertise_id = a2.aid

SELECT advertise_id, name, type, subtype, img, link, unit_price, unit_delivery_number, now_unit_delivery_number, unit_money, now_unit_money, status, start_delivery_date, end_delivery_date, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_tb WHERE unit_price>=#{unitPrice} AND status=#{status}

SELECT advertise_id, name, type, subtype, img, link, unit_price, unit_delivery_number, now_unit_delivery_number, unit_money, now_unit_money, status, start_delivery_date, end_delivery_date, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT advertise_id, name, type, subtype, img, link, unit_price, unit_delivery_number, now_unit_delivery_number, unit_money, now_unit_money, status, start_delivery_date, end_delivery_date, update_date, admin_id FROM advertise_tb WHERE admin_id=#{adminId} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(advertise_id) FROM advertise_tb WHERE admin_id=#{adminId}
